step.cmd: In the Order Management page, select a line in the Line drop-down list box.
step.stepresult: The Released page appears, displaying a list of work orders associated with the selected line.

step.cmd: In the Released page, select a work order in the Ready status that you want to cancel.
Select Yes to cancel the work order.
step.stepresult: The selected work order is cancelled.Select No to go back to the Released page without cancelling the work order.

taskbody.result: The selected work order is cancelled and no longer available in the and applications.
